DOC.brief_summary: Microparticles are cellular fragments which are released actively or passively under conditions of inflammation and stress. The impact of surgical operations on quantity and quality of microparticles remains unknown. In this observatory study we investigate quantitative and qualitative aspects of microparticles during cardiac and abdominal operations.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Microparticles on Postoperative Complications in Surgical Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing cardiac or abdominal operations with a minimum expected operative time of 2 hours Laparoscopic operations emergency operations
